newsitem.title: USA: Lady Luck eyes six week bridge repair.
newsitem.headline: Lady Luck eyes six week bridge repair.

text.p: Lady Luck Gaming Corp Thursday said officials with the Arkansas Department of Transportation believe the Helena Bridge will be repaired and reopened in about six weeks.

Earlier, the company reported the bridge had been damaged and its closure could adversely affect operations at its Rhythm & Blues and Country Casinos in Mississippi. The bridge connects the casino to the city of Helena, Ark.
In a statement, Lady Luck said Arkansas officials also told the company that the bridge's repair is a "top priority."
